title: Samsung's Stacked Unpacked Event and the Start of Smartphone Season
description:
Marques, Andrew, and David discuss the Samsung Flip4 and Fold4, the Galaxy Watch5 Pro, and assess their beginning of the year predictions.

Catch our first impressions of the Samsung Flip4, Fold4, and Galaxy Watch5 Pro here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuWF9G6SSi0
